name: Medieval Medic
description:
Use your vast knowledge of botany and amputation stuff to bring fallen knights back from the brink of death. 

Raise a vast, unstoppable army to fight for you. Or cry because you can't find any mushrooms. Both are equally likely.

Use arrow keys or WASD to move. Push soldiers to your tent to heal them, and win when all enemy units are destroyed. Make sure to collect the items specified by the tent!
